name: Lauren Costigan
description: Lauren Costigan is the wife of Bradley Costigan, who after being imprisoned was contacted by theTyger Clawsto shiv Bigs, an informant in a Militech prison, under the orders of Kon Imai. However, Brad refused, so the Tyger Claws kidnapped Lauren to ensure his compliance. Lauren spends at least thirty days in confinement atMonokatana Workshop, having to be put onto nutrient drip after refusing food twice during her captivity.
